title: Tour de France Stage 3: Cavendish Caught Behind Crash as Girmay Blows Away Sprint Favorites
content:
Eritrean star becomes first Black African to win a Tour stage, Carapaz moves into yellow on countback as GC favorites finish safe.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 3: Cavendish Caught Behind Crash as Girmay Blows Away Sprint Favorites on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
